description: This project is to provide an Architect technology
full_summary:
# Government of Canada - Department of National Defence
## Requirements for Technology Architect Services

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit a Proposal for the provision of Technology Architect services.

### Contract Details

*   Bid Solicitation Number: W8485-TBIPS2023-27
*   Contract Title: TASK BASED EN578-170432, PROFESSIONAL SERVICES REQUIREMENT
*   Contract Duration: Two (2) years with three (3) irrevocable option years

### Scope of Work

The Contractor will provide one (1) I.11 Technology Architect (Level II) to support the Directorate Air Strategic Management (D Air SM) within the DND.

*   Project: TIC3 Air
*   Location: National Capital Region (NCR), 455 boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC
*   Security Clearance: Federal Secret (FSC)

### Technical Requirements

The DND requires the following technical skills and expertise:

*   Systems integration design (81111503)
*   Application implementation services (81111508)
*   Systems architecture (81111705)

### Eligible Suppliers

This Proposal is open to the following pre-qualified suppliers:

*   ACF Associates Inc.
*   ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
*   ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
*   Alika Internet Technologies Inc.
*   Andrew Mazeikis, Andrew Lee
